snippet: FRIEDMAN--Martin. Martin was a valued friend to Isamu Noguchi, and by extension, to The Noguchi Museum. An inimitable spirit, he defined an era. To his and Mickey's beloved daughters, we offer our condolences. David Holbrook, Chair Jenny Dixon, Director The Isamu Noguchi Foundation and Garden Museum 1/3
lead_paragraph: FRIEDMAN--Martin. Martin was a valued friend to Isamu Noguchi, and by extension, to The Noguchi Museum. An inimitable spirit, he defined an era. To his and Mickey's beloved daughters, we offer our condolences. David Holbrook, Chair Jenny Dixon, Director The Isamu Noguchi Foundation and Garden Museum 1/3
